name: Cat Game 3.0
description:
Take care of your cat and then use him to get money! It's the purrfect business plan.

This is a remake of my first ever completed HTML game titled "Cat Game". As the name implies, there was a 2.0 at one point. The original (well, a copy of it) can be found here: https://code.sololearn.com/W8evSuhTZy6s/#
